Idea: The Deorbiter

Story: In 3050, Scientists develop a machine that can deorbit asteroids, moons, and planets. But someone has hacked into the control center at the International Kerbal Space Station, and plans to use the deorbiter to throw the magic boulder at the mun to destroy it. Luckily, Jeb, Bob, and Bill are here to save the day.
Gotta love the magic boulder. They should expand it's collision box

They should make the magic boulder TARGETABLE.

Although, this is actually a pretty neat idea. Someone abusing science for a nefarious plot, and our heroes the Orange Suits, aided by the brilliant Scientists and Steely-eyed Missile Men at ground control, have to become true space heroes, risking life and limb to stop an impending apocalypse!

Clarification: He's trying to hit the Mun with the magic boulder to both

-Hurl the Mun at kerbin

-Destroy the Mun
